[comment] The __VALUES__ below are MiniVend Variable settings. In this case, they come from these settings in catalog.cfg: ## Set some menubars and headers ConfigDir pages Variable LEFTSIDE __COMPANY__
__ADDRESS__
__CITY__

Phone: __PHONE__
Fax: __FAX__
[if variable TOLLFREE] Tollfree: __TOLLFREE__
[/if]

[comment] And the footer as above. [/comment] __RIGHTSIDE__ __MENUBOTTOM__ __COPYRIGHT__
